memberdef.argsstring: (Coord< Dims... > const &coord, TensorCommon< storage_type, ddc::detail::TypeSeq< Dims... > > const &tensor)
memberdef.name: operator+

detaileddescription.para:
An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate to which the tensor is added.
tensor
The tensor to be added to the coordinate.
The new coordinate.

memberdef.argsstring: (Coord< Dims... > const &coord, TensorCommon< storage_type, ddc::detail::TypeSeq< Dims... > > const &tensor)
memberdef.name: operator-

detaileddescription.para:
An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate from which the tensor is subtracted.
tensor
The tensor to be subtracted from the coordinate.
The new coordinate.

memberdef.argsstring: (Coord< Dims... > &coord, TensorCommon< storage_type, ddc::detail::TypeSeq< Dims... > > const &tensor)
memberdef.name: operator+=

detaileddescription.para:
An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate to which the tensor is added.
tensor
The tensor to be added to the coordinate.
The new coordinate.

memberdef.argsstring: (Coord< Dims... > &coord, TensorCommon< storage_type, ddc::detail::TypeSeq< Dims... > > const &tensor)
memberdef.name: operator-=

detaileddescription.para:
An operator to add the elements of a tensor to a coordinate. This can be useful in some calculations, e.g when calculating the foot of a characteristic.
coord
The coordinate from which the tensor is subtracted.
tensor
The tensor to be subtracted from the coordinate.
The new coordinate.

briefdescription.para: An operator to multiply all a tensor by a value.

parameterdescription.para: The value by which the elements should be multiplied.

simplesect.para: A new tensor containing the result of the multiplication.

briefdescription.para: An operator to multiply all the element of the current tensor by a value.

parameterdescription.para: The value by which the elements should be multiplied.

simplesect.para: A new tensor containing the result of the multiplication.

briefdescription.para: An operator to divide all the element of the current tensor by a value.

parameterdescription.para: The value by which the elements should be multiplied.

simplesect.para: A new tensor containing the result of the multiplication.

briefdescription.para: An operator to add two tensors elementwise.

parameterdescription.para: The first tensor in the addition.
The second tensor in the addition.

simplesect.para: A new tensor containing the result of the addition.

briefdescription.para: An operator to subtract one tensor from another elementwise.

parameterdescription.para: The tensor which is subtracted from.
The tensor that should be subtracted.

simplesect.para: A new tensor containing the result of the subtraction.

briefdescription.para: An operator to get the negation of a tensor elementwise.

simplesect.para: A new tensor containing the result of the negation.
